Title: Specifies the occupancy tax in the village of Catskill shall only apply to hotels and motels
Summary: Specifies the occupancy tax in the village of Catskill shall only apply to hotels and motels.
LawCode: Amd ยง1202-bbb, Tax L (as proposed in S.9264-A & A.9911-A)
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the tax law, in relation to the occupancy tax in the village of Catskill
